buffs.description: When included in team, elf's secret skill chance increases by 5%. (However, the increase by Hippogriffs cannot exceed 30%.)
buffs.name: Elf's Secret Skill 2

buffs.description: When elf's secret skill is cast, this has a chance to pass 2 stages at a time. (This chance increases by 2% for each 5-star and 5% for each 6-star, but this only applies when they are included in the team. (Not applied when in Time Shop and cannot exceed 50%.)
buffs.name: Legend of Ancient Forest
